StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetSchoolsByUnit]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@Organiza.onID as integer AS
SELECT HIGH_SCHOOL.ORGANIZATION_ID, HIGH_SCHOOL.SCHOOL_CODE, HIGH_SCHOOL.HIGHSCHOOL_NAME, HIGH_SCHOOL.DOD_CODE, RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION.SHORT_NAME FROM ORGANIZATION_MAP, HIGH_SCHOOL, RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION WHERE ORGANIZATION_MAP.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = @Organiza.onID AND ORGANIZATION_MAP.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = HIGH_SCHOOL.ORGANIZATION_ID AND HIGH_SCHOOL.ORGANIZATION_ID = RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION.ORGANIZATION_ID AND HIGH_SCHOOL.DELETED = 'N' ORDER BY RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION.SHORT_NAME, HIGH_SCHOOL.HIGHSCHOOL_NAME
